name: A+ TECHNICAL TRAINING CENTER (ATTC)
about: A+ Technical Training Center (ATTC) is an Approved Training Organization by the Civil Aviation Authority of the Philippines (CAAP) since 2014. We provide high-quality aviation training programs for airlines, MROs, and aviation schools, both locally and internationally. Our curriculum includes aircraft maintenance training for various aircraft types such as ATR42/72, A320, A330, and B737, as well as skills training in safety wiring, torquing, and other mechanical skills. We also offer a cadetship program to prepare next-generation aviation professionals and a range of other aviation training programs, including safety management and quality management. Our state-of-the-art facilities include maintenance labs, a multipurpose room, and a computer media center, ensuring comprehensive and hands-on learning experiences. ATTC is committed to delivering industry-certified training to excel in aviation careers.
